name: Revenant
description: Macabre spectral power has risen. Infused with the essence of the Eidolon, Revenant has strong survivability and deals high damage. Enemies become his thralls.

abilities.name: Enthrall
abilities.description: Convert a target into a zealous thrall. Thralls turn on their allies and enthrall through damage. On death, they disintegrate into a damaging pillar of energy. The thrall horde remains under Revenants spell until this ability runs out.

abilities.name: Mesmer Skin
abilities.description: Become enveloped in Sentient energy, redirecting damage and stunning all those who dare attack. Stunned enemies can be Enthralled at no energy cost.

abilities.name: Reave
abilities.description: Dash through enemies as a wall of sentient energy, leeching shields and health from any encountered, enhanced for thralls.

abilities.name: Danse Macabre
abilities.description: Erupt with a multitude of Eidolon energy beams and sweep a circle of death around Revenant. The beams will modify their Damage Type to target select defenses, while incoming damage is redirected back into the beams. Hold fire to boost Status Effects and Damage, at the cost of increased energy consumption. Thralls killed by this ability leave overshield pickups.

languages.description: Eine makabre spektrale Kraft hat sich erhoben. Mit der Essenz der Eidolon erfüllt, hat Revenant eine starke Überlebensfähigkeit und verursacht hohen Schaden. Gegner werden zu seinen Lakaien.
languages.name: Revenant

languages.description: La puissance spectrale macabre a augmenté. Imprégné de l'essence des Eidolons, Revenant a une forte capacité de survie et inflige des Dégâts importants. Les ennemis deviennent ses esclaves.
languages.name: Revenant

languages.description: È sorto un potere spettrale e macabro. Infuso con l'essenza dell'Eidolon, Revenant ha un'elevata capacità di sopravvivenza e infligge ingenti danni. I nemici diventeranno i suoi schiavi.
languages.name: Revenant

languages.description: 유령과도 같은 죽음의 힘이 등장했습니다. 아이돌론의 정수가 깃든 레버넌트는 강한 생존력을 보유하며, 높은 피해를 가합니다. 또한 적들은 그에게 사로잡힌 노예가 됩니다.
languages.name: 레버넌트

languages.description: El macabro poder espectral se ha levantado. Infundido con la esencia de eidolon, Revenant tiene una gran capacidad de supervivencia y causa un gran daño. Los enemigos se convierten en sus esclavos.
languages.name: Revenant

languages.description: 恐怖的恶灵之力已经涌现。融合了夜灵本质的 Revenant，拥有强大的生存能力和高额伤害。敌人皆成为他的奴仆。
languages.name: Revenant

languages.description: Жуткая воскресшая призрачная сущность. Ревенант, насыщенный силой Эйдолонов, обладает высокой живучестью и наносит большой вред. Враги становятся его рабами.
languages.name: Ревенант

languages.description: 身の毛のよだつ亡霊の力が立ち上る。エイドロンの精髄が注入されたRevenantは、強い生存力を持ち大ダメージを与える。敵は彼に従うか、散るかの二択である。
languages.name: Revenant

languages.description: Makabryczna upiorna potęga wzrosła. Przesiąknięty esencją Eidolon, Revenant ma silne zdolności przetrwania i zadaje duże obrażenia. Wrogowie stają się jego niewolnikami.
languages.name: Revenant

languages.description: O macabro poder espectral despertou. Infundido com a essência de Eidolon, o Revenant tem grande capacidade de sobrevivência e causa alto dano. Os inimigos se tornam seus escravos.
languages.name: Revenant

languages.description: 死亡的幽靈之力已崛起。Revenant 充滿著夜靈的本質，他有強大的生存能力並造成高傷害。敵人成為他的奴僕。
languages.name: Revenant

languages.description: Revenant ปลุกพลังจากวิญญาณของอสูรร้ายให้ตื่นขึ้นมา เมื่อผสมผสานกับแก่นแท้ที่ได้จาก Eidolon แล้วทำให้ Revenant มีความสามารถในการเอาตัวรอดได้ดีและสร้างความเสียหายได้สูง เปลี่ยนศัตรูให้กลายเป็นทาส Thrall ไว้คอยรับใช้
languages.name: Revenant

languages.description: Ürkütücü spektral güç. Eidolon'un özüyle aşılanan Revenant, güçlü bir dayanıklılık kabiliyetine sahiptir ve yüksek oranda hasar verir. Düşmanlar onun kölesi olur.
languages.name: Revenant

languages.description: Моторошна воскресла примарна сутність. Ревенант, насичений силою ейдолонів, має високу живучість та завдає великої шкоди. Вороги стають його рабами.
languages.name: Ревенант
